name: NSAttributedString.TextEffectStyle
desc: Constants for the text effect attribute key.

items.name: static let letterpressStyle: NSAttributedString.TextEffectStyle
items.desc: A graphical text effect that gives glyphs the appearance of letterpress printing, which involves pressing the type into the paper.

items.name: init(rawValue: String)
items.desc: Creates a text effect style with the specified raw value.
